res: Let $V$ be the set of all quadratic polynomials with real coefficients such that $|P(x)| \le 1$ for all $x \in [0, 1]$. Find the supremum of $|P'(0)|$ across all $P \in V$.The supremum is $8$.

Translating: Let $V$ be the set of all quadratic polynomials with real coefficients such that $|P(x)| \le 1$ for all $x \in [0, 1]$. Find the supremum of $|P'(0)|$ across all $P \in V$.The supremum is $8$.

false
Theorem 2 does not specify conditions on the polynomials or address the supremum of |P′(0)|.
